XXmspram_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXmspram_u:3: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate dakṣiṇe pārśve buddhagocare ratnavṛkṣe prabhāse vanaṣaṇḍe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ //
XXmspram_u:23_0: evaṃ pramukhair ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśatais tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho
XXmspram_u:23_1: māgadhena rājñājātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito
XXmspram_u:24: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūd abhrakūṭaṃ ca prādurbhūtam /
XXmspram_u:25: mahati cākālavātāśanir mahāmeghaś ca samutthito devo garjati guḍaguḍāyati vidyutaś ca niścaranti /
XXmspram_u:28: candrasūryau na prabhavato na tapato na virocato na ca prabhāsvarau bhavataḥ //
XXmspram_u:29: atha bhagavān adrākṣīd divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ tāni bhayāni prādurbhūtani /
XXmspram_u:30: [Mps_2] apy ekatyānāṃ vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ yā grāmāntaḥ purīṣābhūtair adhiṣṭhitā abhisaṃsṛṣṭā /
XXmspram_u:31_1: bhūtair abhibhūtāḥ samantataś ca vaiśālījanapade yā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bhītās
XXmspram_u:31_2: trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ saṃdṛṣṭaromakūpajātā ūrdhvamukhāḥ prakrandanto buddhadharmasaṃghān namasyanti //
XXmspram_u:32: ye ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhaśāsane nābhipannās te cāpy ekatyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo brāhmaṇaṃ namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:33: kecit punaḥ śakraṃ kecil lokapālān namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:35: kathaṃ nāmaitad syād vayam evaṃrūpād upadravato bhayasthānāt parimucyema iti //
XXmspram_u:36_0: atha bhagavāṃs tathā rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram akāśīd yathā rūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena
XXmspram_u:36_1: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ svareṇa vijñāpya sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ prasādya
XXmspram_u:37_0: atha brahmā sahāpatir brahmakāyikāś ca devāḥ śakraś ca devānām indro devāś ca trayastriṃśāś
XXmspram_u:37_1: catvāraś ca mahārājānaś caturmahārājakāyikāś ca devā aṣṭāviṃśatiś ca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo
XXmspram_u:37_2: dvātriṃśac ca mahāyakṣanagnā hārītī ca saputrikā saparivārā atikrāntavarṇā atikrāntāyāṃ
XXmspram_u:37_3: rātrau kevalaṃ kalyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ svakena varṇānubhāvenodāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
XXmspram_u:38: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitā ekavāgekasvaraikapadena bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhituṣṭuvuḥ //
XXmspram_u:43: parvato vā suvarṇasya niṣkaṃ jambūnadasya vā //
XXmspram_u:44: candro vā vimale vyomni nakṣatrebhiḥ puraskṛtaḥ //
XXmspram_u:46: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa muniṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ /
XXmspram_u:50: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottamam /
XXmspram_u:52: atha bhagavān muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇībhavenādhivāsya caturo mahārājān āmantrayāmāsa //
XXmspram_u:53: naitaṃ te mahārājānaḥ pratirūpaṃ bhaved yad yuṣmat pariṣado 'smat pariṣadaṃ viheṭhayitavyaṃ manyate /
XXmspram_u:55: ito hi mānuṣe loke buddhotpādo dharmasvākhyātatā ca saṃghasupratipannatā ca /
XXmspram_u:56: idam asmin bījam avaropya buddhā bhagavanto loka utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:57: pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaḥ śrāvakāś cāsminn ime lokāḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropya sa daśato dvātriṃśatāṃ devanikāyānām anyatarānyatare devanikāye utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:60: teṣāṃ ca putrasahasraṃ bhavati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ mahānagnabalavegadhārināṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ saptaratnasamanvāgatānām /
XXmspram_u:61: tad yuṣmākam alpotsukavihāreṇa viharatām evaṃrūpāṇām asmin loke notpattir bhaviṣyati //
XXmspram_u:62_0: atha vaiśramaṇo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:62_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:63_0: santi bhadanta bhagavann asmākam udārāṇi gṛhasthānabhavanāni nagarodyānavimānakūṭāgāraharmyaniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaśubharucitavividhavicitrapaṭṭadāmaghaṇṭācāmaramuktājālaparikṣiptāni
XXmspram_u:63_1: [Mps_4] dhūpaghaṭikāni dhūpitāni puṣpāvakīrṇāni yeṣu vayaṃ nārīśatasahasraparivṛtāḥ
XXmspram_u:63_2: saṃpūrṇaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtā viharāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:64: teṣām asmākaṃ bhadanta bhagavan pramattānāṃ pramādavihāravihāriṇāṃ viharatāṃ pariṣadaḥ samantād daśadiśo 'nnapānabhojanāni mārgayanti /
XXmspram_u:65: prapalāyamānāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ tiryagjātagarbhānāṃ tiryagyonigatānām api ca prāṇinām ojo haranti viheṭhayanti vighnayanti mārayanti /
XXmspram_u:67: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavato 'ntike caturvarṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ purataḥ svakasvakānāṃ pariṣadāṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:70: āturasya ca hastena tasya mahārājasya nāmnā nānāgandhadhūpā dhūpayitavyāḥ /
XXmspram_u:71: puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dhāraṇīṃ kṛtvā dīpāṃś cādīpya tatra caitye pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:72: madīyāyāḥ pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan yakṣagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:74: nidrā cāviśate tasya śūlo vāpy upajāyate //
XXmspram_u:76: rātrau praharṣam āyāti vepate stanate sadā //
XXmspram_u:77: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:91: sidhyantu me mantrapadāḥ svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca vaiśramaṇasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:92_0: atha dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:92_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:93: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan gandharvagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:95: alubdhaḥ satyavādi ca hasate kupyate punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:97: unmiṣati na cakṣuś ca śayate ca parāṅmukhaḥ //
XXmspram_u:98: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:113: mucyantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvagrahebhyo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:114_0: atha virūḍhako mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:114_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:115: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan kumbhāṇḍagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:116: balavatī tṛṣā bhonti vibhrāntaś cāpi prekṣate /
XXmspram_u:117: mukhaṃ lohitam ābhāti bhūmau svapiti kuñcitaḥ //
XXmspram_u:119: durgandho malinaś cāpi mṛśā sambhinnā bhāṣante //
XXmspram_u:120: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:140: śāmyantu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvagrahāḥ sarvabhayopadravā virūḍhakasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:142_0: atha virūpākṣo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:142_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:143: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan nāgasuparṇīgrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:144: hikkate śvasate cāpi śītalaṃ gātram eva ca /
XXmspram_u:145: svidyate phenalālāsya svapate ca punaḥ punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:146: varṇavān bhavate śūro vepate dhāvate tathā /
XXmspram_u:147: punar nakhān vidarśayati mahīṃ viśati roditi //
XXmspram_u:148: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:166: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca virūpākṣasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:167: atha bhagavāṃs tāvad eva sarvāvatyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purataḥ siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
XXmspram_u:168: daśabalasamanvāgato 'haṃ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradaḥ pariṣady udāram ārṣabhaṃ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadāmi /
XXmspram_u:171: rakṣāyai sarvasatvānāṃ sarve vidyāṃ śṛṇātha me //
XXmspram_u:185: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca tathāgatasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:193: yasyāṃ trasanti bhūtāni śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:196: yo hy etan nābhimanyeta ṛṣivākyaṃ subhāṣitam //
XXmspram_u:200: heṣṭham ūrdhvaṃ caturdikṣu kṣiptvā ca varuṇodakam //
XXmspram_u:201: yadi kṣipraṃ na muñceyuḥ śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:203: kṣemaṃ ca tena lapsyanti yakṣadaṇḍena tarjitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:206: aḍakavatīṃ rājadhānīṃ na gacchanti kadā cana //
XXmspram_u:208: āsanaṃ ca na lapsyanti bhūtasaṃghāḥ samāgame //
XXmspram_u:213: tīkṣṇeṇa cāsya śastreṇa karṇau nāsāṃ ca cchetsyati /
XXmspram_u:216: mukhataḥ sravate cāsya pūyam uṣṇaṃ ca śoṇitam //
XXmspram_u:224: rājñāṃ samāgatānāṃ hi jvalatāṃ tejasā śriyā /
XXmspram_u:225: antarīkṣaṃ tadā śāśtā sarvajño hi samudgataḥ //
XXmspram_u:235: ito buddhā hi jāyante buddhāḥ pratyekajā api //
XXmspram_u:236: itaś ca śrāvakotpattir devāś cāpi samutsthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:241: evam etan mahābrahmann evam etat mahāmune //
XXmspram_u:243: sumeruṃ kaṃpayitvā tu dhāraṇīṃ parivartya ca //
XXmspram_u:246: diśaś cādarśanā bhāgās teṣāṃ neṣyāma sarvadā /
XXmspram_u:247: ye praduṣṭā bhaviṣyanti na ca lokahitodyataḥ //
XXmspram_u:248: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa garhate bhūtakāraṇāt /
XXmspram_u:252: atikrāmanti ye vidyāṃ mantrān auṣadham eva vā //
XXmspram_u:255: teṣāṃ daṇḍaṃ praṇeṣyāmaḥ sūtraṃ brahmaṇā nirmitam /
XXmspram_u:257: buddhasya pādau vanditvā ālokya ca parasparam /
XXmspram_u:263: puṣpapūrṇāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā cūrṇaiś cāpi hiraṇmayaiḥ /
XXmspram_u:264: yaṣṭīr ābadhya hi gale sūtrapāśāṃs tathāpi ca //
XXmspram_u:267: sāhasrapramardanaṃ hy etet saṃśrautuṃ sūtram uttamam /
XXmspram_u:272: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahā gandharvajā mune //
XXmspram_u:275: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahāḥ kumbhāṇḍajā mune /
XXmspram_u:278: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti nāgagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:282: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti yakṣagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:283: digbhāge uttare cāpi bhūtasaṃghāḥ śṛṇontu me //
XXmspram_u:288: putro dvitīyas tasyaiva janako nāma viśrutaḥ /
XXmspram_u:291: putras tritīyas tasyaiva nāmnā cāsau mahāgrahaḥ //
XXmspram_u:302: niṣṭhuraṃ puruṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ sarvabuddhair hi bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:303: eṣa gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ sarve gautamam ādarāt //
XXmspram_u:311: rājakuleṣu dvāreṣu vimāneṣu ca ye sthitāḥ //
XXmspram_u:315: ūrdhvaṃ heṣṭhaṃ ca ye yakṣāś caturdikṣu vidikṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:319: kṛtvā ca vāditaṃ citraṃ gāndharvaṃ nāṭyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:320: indraḥ somaś ca varuṇo bharadvājaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
XXmspram_u:323: prajāgurur yatīśaś ca devasūtaś ca mātaliḥ /
XXmspram_u:329: devā nāgāś ca gandharvā asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:330: traitīyakaś ca unmādās tathā cāturthako jvarāḥ //
XXmspram_u:331: ye ca lokaṃ viheṭhanti praduṣṭā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:334: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama //
XXmspram_u:336: dhāvanti puratas teṣāṃ bhūtā yakṣā mahābhayāḥ //
XXmspram_u:347: kāṇāḥ kubjās tu garuḍā vikṛtākṣā vijṛmbhakāḥ //
XXmspram_u:376: vātaṃ pittaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ kṣobhayanti caturdiśam //
XXmspram_u:389: prasannā guhyakāḥ sarve duṣṭānām ālaye sthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:391: uṣṇair māṃsaiś ca rudhirair bhāntāṅgāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ /
XXmspram_u:404: muñcanti dāruṇaṃ śvāsaṃ saṃtāpenti imāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:412: prekṣanti cāvatāraṃ hi ojo hiṃsanti kilbiṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:416: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama /
XXmspram_u:418: sumerau girirāje ca cakravāḍe tathaiva ca /
XXmspram_u:421: śrīparvatasya mūrdhasthāḥ śṛṅgā ye bhṛśam udgatāḥ //
XXmspram_u:422: yās tatra devatādhastā ṛṣayaś ca tathādhikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:426: vemacitrī rāhulaś ca prahlādaś ca samāgatāḥ /
XXmspram_u:429: sāgaraḥ supratiṣṭhaś ca nāgarājo manasvy api //
XXmspram_u:431: vakṣunando vajramatir gaṅgā sindhuś ca sāgaraḥ //
XXmspram_u:434: kanyās teṣāṃ mahābhāgā añjaliṃ saṃpragṛhya vai /
XXmspram_u:439: śūcīlomā ca madreṣu malleṣu ca yaśodharaḥ /
XXmspram_u:440: vibhīṣaṇaś ca pāñcāle lohitākṣaś ca aśvaje //
XXmspram_u:441: piṅgalaś ca avanteṣu kapilākṣaś ca vaidiśe /
XXmspram_u:442: kumbhodaraś ca matseṣu sūrateṣu ca dīrghilaḥ //
XXmspram_u:443: pramardanas tu gāndhāre sūryamitraś ca kambuṣu /
XXmspram_u:447: kumbhīraḥ sātyakiś cāpi pāñcikaś ca jinarṣabhaḥ /
XXmspram_u:450: yamaś ca yamadūtaś ca māraś cāpi sasainyakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:451: harir nāmnā tv asau yakṣo yakṣakoṭīparigrahaḥ /
XXmspram_u:452: hārītī ca sasainyā tu giridāri ca yakṣiṇī //
XXmspram_u:456: puṣpadantī viśālā ca kharakarṇā ca rākṣasī //
XXmspram_u:459: rākṣasī bhadradantā ca brahmilā viṣṇulā tathā /
XXmspram_u:460: yakṣo hālāhalaś caiva rākṣasaś ca vituṇḍakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:461: śūleṣu te gṛhītvātha gavāś ca mṛgamānuṣān /
XXmspram_u:462: bhakṣayantaś ca jīvanto dhāvantaś ca diśodiśaḥ //
XXmspram_u:479: asty antare tu nagare udyāne vanapuṣpite //
XXmspram_u:484: anubhomi śriyaṃ tv agryāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra maṇḍale /
XXmspram_u:487: annapānais tu vikalā dāruṇās tv itarāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:495: samantād yojanaṃ yāvat kūṭāgārās tu nirmitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:496: suvarnasya bhaved eko dvitīyo rūpyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:497: vaiḍūryasya tṛtīyas tu caturthaḥ sphāṭikaḥ śuciḥ //
XXmspram_u:502: citrair ābharaṇair agraiś citrair veśair alaṃkṛtāḥ //
XXmspram_u:507: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva tathā dārakadārikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:510: sasyaṃ bījaṃ phalaṃ puṣpam oṣadhaṃ pānabhojanam //
XXmspram_u:511: harante mānuṣīṃ lakṣmīm uccānīcīṃ karonti ca /
XXmspram_u:512: ye kecid duṣkṛtā loke vairāḥ kalahavigrahāḥ //
XXmspram_u:513: dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ hataṃ bhinnaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhūtajaṃ smṛtam /
XXmspram_u:515: uttrāsenti ca satvānāṃ viprekṣanti dviṣanti ca /
XXmspram_u:516: darśenti pāpakān svapnān prasuptān pīḍayanti ca //
XXmspram_u:517: dvārasthāś cācchaṭāṃ kṛtvā prakrośanti grasanti ca /
XXmspram_u:525: sadā citrāṇi darśenti ālayeṣu patheṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:526: gṛhāṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca dvāre muñcanti te grahāḥ /
XXmspram_u:527: gṛhītvā jīvitaṃ kāyaṃ kupathe grāmayanti ca /
XXmspram_u:528: vicitrāṇi ca rūpāṇi vicitrāṇi svarāṇi ca //
XXmspram_u:530: rogān vicitrān darśenti vyādhīn vai kāyasaṃsthitān /

XXmspram_u:986_1: apagatasaṃkārāḥ kṛtvā khadirabadarāgniṃ prajvālya puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dharaṇīṃ kṛtvā dvāraśālaśobhanāṃ
XXmspram_u:986_2: nānāgandhapradhūpitāṃ kṛtvā sarvabījāni sarpiṣāṃ mrakṣayitvā caturdiśaṃ prakṣeptavyāni /
XXmspram_u:987: agnau ca prakṣeptavyāni nānāraṅgāni ca sūtrāṇi dvāre bandhanīyāni tiryagyonigatāni niṣkāsya punaḥ praveśayitavyāni /
XXmspram_u:990: glānasya purato buddhapratibimbaṃ vā [Msp_31] buddhaśarīraṃ vā /
XXmspram_u:991: samudgatemaṃ cevāpīṭhe vāvaropya brahmapratibimbaṃ vā śakrapratibimbaṃ vā caturmahārājapratibimbaṃ vā catasro mudrāḥ kṛtvā sthāpayitavyāḥ /
XXmspram_u:992: nānāpuṣpair nānādhūpair nānāgandhair brahmaśakracaturmahārājamaheśvarayakṣasenāpatir yakṣamahānagnā hārītī ca namnā trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:993: teṣāṃ balenaiśvaryādhipatena ca svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca muñcantu sarvaglānāḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1001: hārītī ca tathā devī gṛhya paśyāṃ tathā śubham /
XXmspram_u:1004: sarvam upahāraṃ cāpi bhavatv amṛtam auṣadham //
XXmspram_u:1007: kanakāhvasya jñānena ṛddhyā vai kāśyapasya ca /
XXmspram_u:1010: imāṃ pāṇitale vidyāṃ tasmin kāle udāharet //
XXmspram_u:1020: nihatāḥ sarvarogāś ca svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvadā sarvabhayebhyaḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1022_0: sarvakākhordavetāḍasaṃprayukteṣu karmasu tena puruṣeṇa striyā vā 'horātro vapuṣṭena
XXmspram_u:1022_1: susnātena subhūṣitena puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ nānāgandhapradhūpitāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ kṛtvā khadiravadarāgniṃ
XXmspram_u:1023: nānāraṅgāni ca sūtrāṇi śastreṣu vā śūleṣu vā kunteṣu vā kāṇḍeṣu vā granthayitvā bandhanīyāni sarvamūlāni sarvapuṣpāṇi nānāgandhodakaṃ kṛtvā mahati kuṇḍe prakṣeptavyāni /
XXmspram_u:1025: tasya taṃ sūtrakam ābandhya kuṇḍe 'dhiṣṭhāpanīyaḥ śastreṇa taṃ sūtrakaṃ cchitvā agnau prakṣeptavyam /
XXmspram_u:1027: buddhāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye /
XXmspram_u:1049: imair mantrapadair mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakākhordavetāḍauṣadhimantraviṣayogāḥ sarvadevaiś ccheditāḥ parājitāḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1050: galagaṇḍavaisarpātisāronmādagaṇḍapiṭakabhagandaraviṣapītakāt parimocayitukāmena susnātena subhūṣitena bhadrapīṭhāsananiṣaṇṇena iyaṃ vidyā udāhartavyā /
XXmspram_u:1057: maitryā vai brahmaṇā caiva aiśvaryeṇa śatakratoḥ //
XXmspram_u:1060: vīryeṇa tejasā teṣāṃ viṣam astv aviṣaṃ sadā /
XXmspram_u:1074: hatā gaṇḍāḥ kilāsāś ca vaisarpāś ca vicarcikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1075: piṭṭakā lohaliṅgāś ca kacchūr bhavati saptamī //
XXmspram_u:1076: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1078: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1080: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1082: viṣasya pṛthivī mātā viṣasya pṛthivī pitā /
XXmspram_u:1083: etena satyavākyena viṣāḥ sarve syur nirviṣāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1084: bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmantu viṣaṃ pūrṇapātre vā saṃkrāmantu viṣaṃ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1085: athātaḥ kalikalahavigrahavivādaparacakraśatrūṇy aparājayitukāmena pūrvaṃ mahācaitye pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:1087: buddhena nirjitā mārā dharmeṇa ca adharmatā /
XXmspram_u:1088: saṃghena nirjitā tīrthyā indreṇa asurā jitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1089: asurais tu jitaḥ somo vainateyena sāgaraḥ //
XXmspram_u:1091: agninā ca jitāḥ kāṣṭhā udakenāgniḥ parājitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1093: satyena devās tiṣṭhanti satyena pṛthivī sthitā /
XXmspram_u:1094: satyaṃ buddhaś ca dharmaś ca satyaṃ jayatu mā mṛṣāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1110: tato 'tha śāstā sarvajña imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata //
XXmspram_u:1112: vajrasya co nāma gṛhītvā sarvadā naivaṃ bhayaṃ bhonti na chambitatvam //
XXmspram_u:1113: ya eṣān aṣṭān mahādyutīnāṃ nāmāni kīrteya anugrahārtham /
XXmspram_u:1114: na tasya agnir na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ krameṇa kāye kṛta sapavitre //
XXmspram_u:1115: saced asau āghātane upasthite utkṛṣṭaśastre vadhake ca saṃmukham /
XXmspram_u:1116: anusmaranto avalokiteśvaraṃ te khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ prapateyuḥ śastrāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1117: saced udgṛhītaṃ pi bhaveta śastraṃ bhañjitvā pāṇiṃ dharaṇīṃ pateyuḥ /
XXmspram_u:1118: na tasya kāye nipateya kiṃcid anyatra karma pūrimena yat kṛtam //
XXmspram_u:1120: namo 'stu te buddha anantagocarā namo 'stu te satyaprakāśakā mune /
XXmspram_u:1121: satyaṃ pratiṣṭhāya prajāya mocase sarve ca kāmāḥ saphālā bhavantu //
XXmspram_u:1129: dharmāya ca viśiṣṭhāya saṃghāya ca gaṇottame //
XXmspram_u:1130: buddhasya pādau vanditvā brahmā vacanam abravīt /
XXmspram_u:1131: buddhāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye //
XXmspram_u:1132: ṛṣayo lokapālāś ca yāvanto devatāpi ca /
XXmspram_u:1135: śakyo na te 'pi ca draṣṭuṃ nāpi śakyāś caturdiśam //
XXmspram_u:1136: yāsāṃ putro na jāyante yāsāṃ garbho na tiṣṭhati /
XXmspram_u:1139: niṣpannā garbhayā ca strī jāyate na viśalyate //
XXmspram_u:1140: nāmāni teṣām ākhyāse lokanātha śṛṇohi me /
XXmspram_u:1142: mātṛkā jāmikaś caiva kāminī revatī tathā /
XXmspram_u:1150: apasmāragṛhītas tu pheṇaṃ lālāṃ ca muñcati /
XXmspram_u:1163: tatra rūpaṃ samākhyāsye yathā trāsyanti dārakān /
XXmspram_u:1175: tasya lekhaṃ ca mudrāṃ ca datvā dūtyena preṣayet /
XXmspram_u:1176: ugrān grantha samānehi tvaṃ tān pañcadaśān grahān //
XXmspram_u:1179: etāni tāni bhūtāni bījaṃ nāśenti prāṇinām /
XXmspram_u:1181: yasyā na jāyate putro jāto vā yasya gṛhyate /
XXmspram_u:1187: ardharātre sthite kāle mūṣṭiṃ sthitvā tu sarṣapān //
XXmspram_u:1188: brahmanirmitam ity āhur brahmaṇā ca prakaṃpitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1190: yo imām atikramed vidyāsūtraṃ brahmaṇā nirmitām /
XXmspram_u:1210: kṣipraṃ saṃtiṣṭhatāṃ garbhaḥ samyag vardhantu indriyā /
XXmspram_u:1211: garbhasthāḥ sukhino bhontu mā ca naśyantu jātakāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1214: eṣā rakṣā samākhyātā ciraṃ jīvantu dārakāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1215: tato 'tha śāstā sarvajña imāṃ gāthām udāharet //
XXmspram_u:1216: rakṣito bhavantu garbhaḥ sukhaṃ modantu dārakāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1236: yatredaṃ nagare sūtraṃ grāme vā yadi vā gṛhe /
XXmspram_u:1237: nātra bālā mariṣyanti yatra tiṣṭhet subhāṣitaṃ //
XXmspram_u:1239: namo bhagavate buddhāya namo brahmaṇe sidhyantu //
XXmspram_u:1240: mantrapadās tārayantu imāṃ vidyāṃ brahmā manyatu svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1241: atha vaiśramaṇo mahārāja ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalir [Msp_38] bhagavantaṃ namasyamāno 'vocat /
XXmspram_u:1242: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta bhagavan śrāvaka idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtram udgṛhṇayād vārayed vācayed deśayet paryavāpnuyāt tena vā bahuśrutena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1244: aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca tv ete yakṣasyodāracaityapūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyā āvartayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1245: tasyāṣṭamyāṃ catvāro rājapuruṣā mahārājānāṃ purataḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti /
XXmspram_u:1246: caturdaśyāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ purataḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti /
XXmspram_u:1247: pañcadaśyāṃ svayam eva catvāro mahārājānaḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti //
XXmspram_u:1248: sarvasatvahitānukaṃpīvatāyaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvako ya idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtram udgṛhṇati dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti /
XXmspram_u:1249: tasya ca bhadanta bhagavan vayaṃ catvāro mahārājānaś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1251: sarvasatvair gurukṛtaś ca mānitaś ca pūjitaś ca rājñāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1252: anyatīrthakaśravaṇabrāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ pūjyo bhaviṣyati mitrāmitramadhyagato 'pi satkṛto bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1253: te ca śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śucinā bhavitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1255: na kudeśalābhena na kumitrasaṃsargeṇa na kudeśavāsasaṃprayuktena bhavitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1256: yasya ca bhūtagrahagṛhītasya purata idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanī nāma sūtraṃ śrāvayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1257: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ svayam eva rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti /
XXmspram_u:1258: evaṃ maharddhikaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ yasyāpi gṛhe ekam api rātriṃ divaṃ vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1259: tasya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad amanuṣyā avatāraṃ na lapsyanti /
XXmspram_u:1260: namasyanīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvabhūtagaṇasya yaḥ idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ dhārayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1261: tasya kāṅkṣataś catvāro mahārājāno sukham upadarśayanti /
XXmspram_u:1263: tat kasya hetor ye kecil loke vidyā [Msp_39] saṃvidhāsyanti /
XXmspram_u:1266: gaṃbhīravipulo pramāṇāni dūrāvataraṇā asādhāraṇā iyaṃ dharmamudrā //
XXmspram_u:1273: paripelavaṃ rasaṃ vīrā sāmakaṃ tagaraṃ busā /
XXmspram_u:1275: priyaṃgu rocanā spṛkkā sarṣapāś ca manaḥśilāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1281: yo hi paśyati tat sthānaṃ bhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ tataḥ /
XXmspram_u:1282: sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām //
XXmspram_u:1286: yatrāsau vrajate pakṣī diśaṃ cāpi digantaram //
XXmspram_u:1287: sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām /
XXmspram_u:1289: samantād yojanaṃ tatra svasti śāntir bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1298: aputro labhate putram adhano labhate dhanam /
XXmspram_u:1300: tiryagyonigate caiva tat syād vṛkṣaphaleṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:1302: tatra mantrapadāny asti indrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
XXmspram_u:1319: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvadigvidigbhyaḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1321: tato brahmā ca śakraś ca lokapālā maheśvaraḥ /
XXmspram_u:1325: sadevamānuṣe loke sadṛśas te na vidyate /
XXmspram_u:1331: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama /
XXmspram_u:1333: atha bhagavān sāyāhnakālasamaye pratisaṃlayanād utthāya bhikṣūn āmantrayāmāsa /
XXmspram_u:1334: udgṛhṇadhvaṃ bhikṣavo mahāsāhasrapramardanīśūtraṃ dhārayata vācayata paryavāpnuyāt /
XXmspram_u:1336: sadevakasya lokasya [Msp_41] dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya sparśavihāratāyai /
XXmspram_u:1337: yaḥ kaścid bhikṣavo mama śravaka etena mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtreṇa śuṣkavṛkṣasyāpi paritrāṇaṃ badhnīyāt parigrahaṃ tasya patrapuṣpaphalāni jayeran /
XXmspram_u:1339: evam uktās te bhikṣavo bhagavantam etad avocat /
XXmspram_u:1345: piṇḍapātraṃ ca bhojanaṃ niśrāya pravrajyā vyākṛtā /
XXmspram_u:1347: idam eva bahutaraṃ yad idaṃ pañcāmiṣasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tatra vayaṃ bhagavan kathaṃ pratipadyāmaḥ //
XXmspram_u:1348: evam ukte bhagavān tān bhikṣūn etad avocat /
XXmspram_u:1349: tena hi bhikṣavo yo hy etat mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ dhārayitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1351: tena hi piṇḍapātraṃ parigṛhītā āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1362_0: ātmarakṣā aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca rājagotrāya kanyāya susnātāya subhūṣitāya
XXmspram_u:1362_1: ahorātro vapuṣṭāya pañcaśikṣāpadaparigṛhītayā lohitaṃ sūtraṃ caturguṇaṃ kārayitvā
XXmspram_u:1363: granthiṃ kṛtvā tat sūtraṃ navena śastreṇa cchitvā dagdhā ratnabhaṇḍo vā udakaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā puṣpair ācchādayitvā nānāgandhena dhūpayitvā iyaṃ vidyā āvartayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1364: yāvat taj jātaṃ sūtraṃ bhājane prādurbhavati /
XXmspram_u:1377: idaṃ puṣpaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca pratigṛhṇantu mamāhutim /
XXmspram_u:1378: prīṇitā pūjitā bhūtvā ete śodhantu bhojanam //
XXmspram_u:1383: chinnaṃ dagdhaṃ yathā sūtraṃ tādṛśaṃ bhavate punaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1394: yena dagdhaṃ yathā sūtraṃ satyaṃ kurvantu tādṛśam //
XXmspram_u:1401: śikhinaṃ ca buddhaṃ sugataṃ ca viśvabhum /
XXmspram_u:1404: etena saptān narottamānāṃ puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca śarīrapūjāṃ kāyena vācā [Msp_43] manasā ca kṛtvā prasannacittaśaraṇaṃ hy upaimi /
XXmspram_u:1405: eteṣu buddheṣu maharddhikeṣu yā devatāḥ santi abhiprasannāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1406: tā devatā āttamanā udagrāḥ kurvanti śāntiṃ ca nityam /
XXmspram_u:1407: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1408: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavo bodhisatvā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
